oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Leslie Candy Company, ca. 1926
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: unknown
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Leslie Candy Company, Depot Street, Knoxville, TN. Ca. 1926. Interior view showing candy making area and workers holding large peppermint candy.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Leslie Candy Company, business enterprises, group portraits, workers
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Knox County Two Centuries Photograph Project
